Hear the full interview below!    http://bit.ly/New-Space Justin Oliveira, CEO of Analytical Space explains how Small Sats, hyperspectral imaging and the use of optical networks are revolutionizing many aspects of the traditional satellite industry. kratoscomms.com Spectral Fingerprints, Laser Communications and the emerging Space Economy | Kratos Communications Justin Oliveira, CEO of Analytical Space explains how Small Sats, hyperspectral imaging and the use of optical networks are revolutionizing many aspects of the traditional satellite industry. Justin Oliveira, CEO of Analytical Space explains how Small Sats, hyperspectral imaging and the use of optical networks are revolutionizing many aspects of the traditional satellite industry. Analytical Space November 8, 2018  ·  Analytical Space will be hosting the first edition of the Downlink speaker series next week at the Engine in Cambridge. Join us for beer, wine and an educational talk on high power-density ultracapacitors for small satellite applications, presented by Wyatt Andree and Susheel Kalabathula from Nanoramic Laboratories. THU, NOV 15, 2018 The Downlink Speaker Series: Space-Grade Ultracapacitors The Engine  ·  Cambridge, MA 6 people went Analytical Space November 1, 2018  ·  "In space, there's no 4G data connection like there is on the ground. Satellites are stuck in the dial-up era" While satellites may be some of our most impressive technology, they are bogged down by a single bottleneck — data. Satellites orbiting Earth routinely struggle to relay data back down to Earth in a timely manner, with sizable implications for the real world, on the ground economy.
